Sentence.value: Listeriosis is an infection that can occur when a person eats food that has been contaminated with bacteria called Listeria monocytogenes (L. monocytogenes).
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: [[Listeriosis|C0023860]] is an [[infection|C0009450]] that can occur when a person eats food that has been contaminated with bacteria called Listeria monocytogenes (L. monocytogenes).
